abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Rural
            Electrification Project is to increase access to efficient
            and sustainable electricity services in rural areas of Peru.
            The restructuring paper seeks: (i) the approval of a 9-month
            extension for the loan agreement; (ii) the cancellation of
            US$608,641.31 dollars from the loan agreement; (iii) the
            cancellation of US$5 million Global Environment Facility, or
            GEF grant agreement, (iv) and the cancellation of component
            four of the project (financing small hydropower stations).
            The modifications do not change the project's
            objectives, remaining project components implementation or
            any other relevant aspect of it.
